Identifying VDC Claims
VDC claims are identifiable through a special issue flash and claim labels. Upon establishment of a claim, the VDC process affixes the special issue flash
VONAPP Direct Connect
under the first listed contention.  Additionally, VDC uses claim labels beginning with the term
eBenefits
.
The table below lists the VDC claim labels with corresponding end product (EP) series.

Notes
:
All claims received subsequent to the VDC submission by the claimant will create an incremental EP 400 series with an
eBenefits
claim label.
If a claimant submits his/her/their claim by means other than VDC and subsequently submits a claim through VDC, this will also create an incremental EP 400.
